medical_history.chief_complaint: Intractable seizures with altered consciousness and automatisms.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Seizures began at 3 years of age, characterized by altered consciousness with oroalimentary and gestural automatisms. At 14 years, seizures lasted 1 to 2 minutes and occurred approximately once a week, resistant to multiple medications. A cluster of 10 seizures occurred during a span of 24 hours before admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Learning disabilities; seizure disorder with previous unsuccessful management with anti-epileptic medications.
medical_history.family_history: Biologic father was left-handed; otherwise, family history unremarkable.
